items.text: length on off, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: off the glove and over the keeper. Loses shape there. Bouncer down leg side. No feet as he swishes under this with a hook and is completely cramped
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length on off, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: short of a length on off, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: gets a hand on it but can't hold on. Full ball on middle is driven firmly and uppishly to Astle's right, but he can only take some pace off it for long-on
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length at off, tapped into the covers
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle, turned to short fine's left with soft hands
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: a second fifty in the series for Mithun, brought up with some authority. Superb batting from him again, after the chances he has been given. Full ball on middle stump and he gets the front leg out of the way before slogging this over the midwicket boundary
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, SIX runs

items.text: lovely. Full ball outside off, opens his stance and goes inside-out to get this well in front of sweeper cover. One bounce and four
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off stump, defended off the back foot
items.postText: Andy: "NZ seem to have a recurring theme - knock the top off, but struggle with the middle order. Boult and Southee will open in the WC, but the change bowlers really need to support them better"
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: slower ball at a length outside off, driven on the rise to mid-off
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: spanks this to the midwicket boundary! Fully in control of the hook this time. Short ball slanted across off stump. Pummels it in front of square
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length outside off, cut to backward point's right, can't beat his dive
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: past mid-on. Gorgeous batting the last three balls. Shots against all lengths. This one is full on middle. Holds his shape and punches it between bowler and fielder with a full face
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length outside off, guided to point off the back foot
items.postText: Jed: "Southee? He won't be opening for New Zealand at the World Cup Henry or bracewell seems more likely "
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full slider on leg stump, inside edge onto pad on the flick
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, backs away and drives it straight back to the bowler
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: through him! Looks like Mithun had made the decision to go after everything, possibly because of his hamstring trouble. This was a slider from Astle, at a length on middle stump. Went straight on and tonked leg stump as he looked to play the cut
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, OUT

items.text: length on leg stump, nudged into the leg side off the front foot
items.shortText: Astle to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: the bails are off but that's through Latham's gloves touching them. Short skidder outside off draws an outside edge from Mehidy as he's late on the cut, but there's no one at slip
items.shortText: Astle to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.text: full on leg stump, leans in and tickles it fine. Taylor gives chase and puts in a slide to drag this back in
items.shortText: Astle to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 3 runs

items.text: full toss on middle, flicked to deep square
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: length ball outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Henry to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: that looks plumb and it is given. Sabbir will review though. Only height could save him here if he hasn't got an inside edge on it. He's been pinned on the back foot, trying to flick, in front of middle stump. No bat...but it is high! Good review from the batsman. This is climbing over middle and leg. It hit him on the thigh guard of his back leg
items.shortText: Henry to Sabbir Rahman, no run
